sense.name: catch and take into custody
sense.examples: He was arrested when customs officers found drugs in his bag. The police arrested her for drinking and driving. Airport officials were arrested after a major heist.

sense.name: stop or interrupt something
sense.examples: The treatment has so far done little to arrest the spread of the cancer. The look in his eyes arrested him on the spot. The mechanism will arrest the motion of the flywheel.

sense.name: take a hold and capture suddenly
sense.examples: An astonishing sight arrested our attention. The musician had arrested his interest at first glance.
